currency.description: The price calculation is based on the currency.

currentPage.description: The current page of the search-results page.

facetMode.description: Specifies whether the response includes no facets, only standard facets or standard and custom facets.

lang.description: A two-digit code used for the localisation of the search-results.

query.description: If the search-query is empty or null, a wildcard search is executed which returns all products of a shop.

resultsPerPage.description: The number of search-results which are displayed on a single page.

sortBy.description: Determines the sorting of the search-results.

taxArea.description: If the alias of the tax-area is not set, the price-calculation is based on net-prices.
